name: TestLocation
title: Test Location
description: Location (e.g., home, clinician office, hospital, etc) where each test/survey/assessment was administered. (Business ID: Entry 2401678)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Test Location.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an location (e.g., home, clinician office, hospital, etc) where each test/survey/assessment was administered..),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Test Location.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Test Location.)
